title.narrative: F.a: Awareness creation for PWDs in Lake Victoria Region

description.narrative: The project is for creating awareness amongst 60 Persons with Disabilities. The group is doing this through the establishment of working committee, a wareness training which will be done in two phases comprising of 30 people for each training. The duratio n for each training will be 8 days. The main topics to be covered are human rights of PWDs (associated acts and laws which support the rights), gender development, dispute resolution, democracy + governance, family law + succession, rape, sexual harassment , education, gender based violence, constitution and community development . In addition, they will also do outreach programmes, recruit facilitators and administration cost.
